mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NAME AS empName, #사원명 CONCAT(LEFT(E.EMP_INCO_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(E.EMP_INCO_DATE,5,2),'.', RIGHT(E.EMP_INCO_DATE,2)) AS empIncoDate, #입사일 D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, #부서명 R.RANK_NAME AS rankName, #직위명 CONCAT(LEFT(E.EMP_BDAY,4),'.', SUBSTRING(E.EMP_BDAY,5,2),'.', RIGHT(E.EMP_BDAY,2)) AS empBday, #생년월일 CONCAT(LEFT(E.EMP_TNO,3),'-', SUBSTRING(E.EMP_TNO,4,4),'-', RIGHT(E.EMP_TNO,4)) AS empTno, #전화번호 E.EMP_EMAIL AS empEmail #이메일주소 FROM EMPLOYEE E INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE INNER JOIN RANK R ON R.RANK_CODE = E.RANK_CODE WHERE E.EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM EMPLOYEE_REMINDING_VAC WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno}

SELECT EMRE_VAC_UD AS emreVacUd, #연차일수 EMRE_PVAC_UD AS emrePvacUd, #유급휴가사용일수 EMRE_REMNDR_UD AS emreRemndrUd #잔여일수 FROM EMPLOYEE_REMINDING_VAC WHERE EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno} AND BASE_YEAR = LEFT(#{baseMonth},4)

SELECT D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, #부서명 DP.DEPN_TIT AS depnTit, #일정 제목 DP.DEPN_CNTN AS depnCntn, #일정 내용 CONCAT(LEFT(DP.DEPN_STRT_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(DP.DEPN_STRT_DATE,5,2),'.', SUBSTRING(DP.DEPN_STRT_DATE,7,2),'~', LEFT(DP.DEPN_END_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(DP.DEPN_END_DATE,5,2),'.', SUBSTRING(DP.DEPN_END_DATE,7,2)) AS DepnDate #시작~종료일자 FROM DEPARTMENT_PLAN DP INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON DP.DEPT_CODE = D.DEPT_CODE WHERE DP.EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno} AND (REPLACE(LEFT(NOW(),10),'-','') >= LEFT(DP.DEPN_STRT_DATE,8) OR REPLACE(LEFT(NOW(),10),'-','') <= LEFT(DP.DEPN_END_DATE,8)) AND DP.DEPN_DEL_YN='N'

SELECT IFNULL(SUM( IF( SUBSTRING(VAST_START_DATE,5,2)=SUBSTRING(VAST_END_DATE,5,2), VAST_VAC_UD, (TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(VAST_START_DATE))-TO_DAYS(VAST_START_DATE))+1 ) ),0) AS cnt FROM VAC_STATEMENT WHERE REQ_EMP_EMNO = #{empEmno} AND VAST_START_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{baseMonth},'%') AND (VAST_C = 'V1' OR VAST_C = 'V2') AND VAST_PROGRESS_SITUATION='승인완료'

SELECT IFNULL(AVG(X.CNT),0) AS avgCnt FROM ( SELECT SUM( IF( SUBSTRING(VAST_START_DATE,5,2)=SUBSTRING(VAST_END_DATE,5,2), VAST_VAC_UD, (TO_DAYS(LAST_DAY(VAST_START_DATE))-TO_DAYS(VAST_START_DATE))+1 ) )AS CNT FROM VAC_STATEMENT WHERE REQ_EMP_EMNO != #{empEmno} AND VAST_START_DATE LIKE CONCAT(#{baseMonth},'%') AND (VAST_C = 'V1' OR VAST_C = 'V2') AND VAST_PROGRESS_SITUATION='승인완료' GROUP BY REQ_EMP_EMNO )X

SELECT V.REQ_EMP_EMNO AS empEmno, E.EMP_NAME AS empName, D.DEPT_NAME AS deptName, IF(V.VAST_START_DATE = V.VAST_END_DATE, CONCAT(LEFT(V.VAST_START_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(V.VAST_START_DATE,5,2),'.', RIGHT(V.VAST_START_DATE,2)), CONCAT(LEFT(V.VAST_START_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(V.VAST_START_DATE,5,2),'.', RIGHT(V.VAST_START_DATE,2),'~', LEFT(V.VAST_END_DATE,4),'.', SUBSTRING(V.VAST_END_DATE,5,2),'.', RIGHT(V.VAST_END_DATE,2))) AS vastTerm, IF(V.VAST_C='V1','연차',IF(V.VAST_C='V2','반차','기타휴가')) AS vastC FROM VAC_STATEMENT V INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON V.REQ_EMP_EMNO = E.EMP_EMNO INNER JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON D.DEPT_CODE = E.DEPT_CODE WHERE V.VAST_PROGRESS_SITUATION = '승인완료' AND (REPLACE(LEFT(NOW(),10),'-','') >= V.VAST_START_DATE AND REPLACE(LEFT(NOW(),10),'-','') <= V.VAST_END_DATE)
